columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the file system provided by the user.

columns.name: file_system_id
columns.description: The ID of the file system, assigned by Amazon EFS.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the EFS file system.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The AWS account that created the file system.

columns.name: creation_token
columns.description: The opaque string specified in the request.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time that the file system was created.

columns.name: automatic_backups
columns.description: Automatic backups use a default backup plan with the AWS Backup recommended settings for automatic backups.

columns.name: life_cycle_state
columns.description: The lifecycle phase of the file system.

columns.name: number_of_mount_targets
columns.description: The current number of mount targets that the file system has.

columns.name: performance_mode
columns.description: The performance mode of the file system.

columns.name: encrypted
columns.description: A Boolean value that, if true, indicates that the file system is encrypted.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The ID of an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) that was used to protect the encrypted file system.

columns.name: throughput_mode
columns.description: The throughput mode for a file system.

columns.name: provisioned_throughput_in_mibps
columns.description: The throughput, measured in MiB/s, that you want to provision for a file system.

columns.name: size_in_bytes
columns.description: The latest known metered size (in bytes) of data stored in the file system.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The JSON formatted FileSystemPolicy for the EFS file system.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with Filesystem.
